hero.introSuffix: - a full-stack developer specialising in web, desktop, and mobile applications. I turn complex requirements into elegant, high-performance software.

about.paragraph1: With over 5 years of hands-on experience, I specialise in building software that's not just functional but exceptional. I work closely with clients to understand the business context behind every feature, ensuring the end result is always purposeful.
about.paragraph2: My practice spans the full stack: from database architecture to pixel-perfect interfaces. Whether it's a complex enterprise web app, a cross-platform desktop tool, or a polished mobile experience, I bring the same level of craftsmanship to every project.

web.title: Web Application
web.desc: Scalable, high-performance web apps built with modern frameworks. From complex SaaS dashboards to customer-facing portals, designed to convert and engineered to scale.

desktop.title: Desktop Application
desktop.desc: Cross-platform desktop solutions that feel native on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Powerful offline capabilities with a polished, intuitive interface.

mobile.title: Mobile Application
mobile.desc: Native-quality mobile experiences for iOS and Android. Smooth animations, responsive design, and deep platform integration your users will love.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.desc: Thoughtful design systems and pixel-perfect interfaces that balance beauty with usability. Every interaction is intentional, every detail considered.

nexora.title: Nexora Dashboard
nexora.desc: Enterprise analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, role-based access, and multi-tenant architecture for a SaaS fintech startup.

fieldops.title: FieldOps Mobile
fieldops.desc: Offline-first field management app for logistics teams. GPS tracking, task assignment, and photo reporting with seamless sync when back online.

vaultr.title: Vaultr Desktop
vaultr.desc: Secure local password and secrets manager with end-to-end encryption, auto-fill integration, and a minimal, distraction-free interface.

artisane.title: Artisane Storefront
artisane.desc: Premium e-commerce platform for a luxury goods brand. Custom CMS, multi-currency checkout, and editorial-style product presentation.
